name: places/ChIJAWbkTdlZwokRCTUZSD199iA
formattedAddress: 137 Hudson St, New York, NY 10013, USA
adrFormatAddress: 137 Hudson St, New York, NY 10013, USA

originalText.text:
Everything I have ever bought from this store has been met with compliments en masse from strangers and friends. Both stores have a selection for all genders and sizes and even BABIES AND YOUR FUR BABIES TOO.
The clothes are high quality and always sold with care. They carry a range of high end fashion and small boutiques and designer items.
Each item I own(and trust me, it is several) has become a staple in some way to my wardrobe.
The owner, Lauren, and staff are so friendly and always offer their honest advice when shopping for anything. These girls work really hard to provide a safe and inclusive space for everyone especially those who work and live in the neighborhood. They have a rotating selection of pieces from local designers and jewelry makers, and if you're in the mood to buy some art to decorate your home, they have that too.

This neighborhood staple is a MUST STOP SHOP if you're in the west village for fashion week or on vacation.

originalText.text: A must go! Half of my wardrobe is from Kismet and I love every piece. They sell fabulous brands at great prices in a lovely setting. It’s a gem in the neighborhood!

text.text: A must go! Half of my wardrobe is from Kismet and I love every piece. They sell fabulous brands at great prices in a lovely setting. It’s a gem in the neighborhood!

originalText.text: I stopped by Kismet on a recommendation from a friend because I was looking for the perfect winter coat to keep me warm. Enter the sitting suit. It's lightweight enough for late fall, but also the perfect barrier against the cold. 10/10 recommend.

text.text: I stopped by Kismet on a recommendation from a friend because I was looking for the perfect winter coat to keep me warm. Enter the sitting suit. It's lightweight enough for late fall, but also the perfect barrier against the cold. 10/10 recommend.

originalText.text: A trip to New York for me isn’t complete without a stop by Kismet West Village. The staff, the selection, it’s all incredible. If you’re in the West Village, this is a must stop shop.

text.text: A trip to New York for me isn’t complete without a stop by Kismet West Village. The staff, the selection, it’s all incredible. If you’re in the West Village, this is a must stop shop.

originalText.text: Went there to buy a gift , regular customer but my last experience was horrible bad customer service would not let me exchange for different size and was rude ! Don’t go there with good expectations. Neighborhood stick together
